Introduction

VVS is a five-member boy group signed with Wannabe Entertainment. The group consists of Shinhwa, Minjae, Allan, Taeseok and Hyosung.

On August 24, 2023, they released “Bang Bang” as their pre-debut single.

On July 11, 2024, it was announced that the group would release their debut digital single "We On Top" and pre-perform on July 15. Then, on August 6, their music video and debut album were released on online streaming platforms.
